code: import i18next from"i18next";import HttpBackend from"i18next-http-backend";import LanguageDetector from"i18next-browser-languagedetector";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";var apiKey="xCCKEjTvrqnBJ8GtHx_kBg";var loadPath="https://api.i18nexus.com/project_resources/translations/{{lng}}/{{ns}}.json?api_key=".concat(apiKey);i18next.use(HttpBackend).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({fallbackLng:"en",ns:["default"],defaultNS:"default",supportedLngs:["en","ru"],backend:{loadPath:loadPath}});
